subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Nobody impacted the Game 4 and 5 classics of the 2004 A.L.C.S. and changed the decades-old dynamic of the Yankees-Red Sox rivalry the way David Ortiz did.
snippet: Nobody impacted the Game 4 and 5 classics of the 2004 A.L.C.S. and changed the decades-old dynamic of the Yankees-Red Sox rivalry the way David Ortiz did.
